attributes.action: Abolish Cleveland Police and form Tees Valley Police
attributes.additional_details: Cleveland no longer exists and neither does Teesside, nor is Darlington part of County Durham anymore. Therefore, Cleveland Police should be abolished and Durham Police's responsibility for Darlington withdrawn to form a new Tees Valley Police force responsible for policing Middlesbrough, Darlington, Stockton on Tees, Hartlepool and Redcar.
